attributes.action: Reject the The Health and Care Bill and stop slowly privatising the nhs.
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the Health and Social Care Act (HSCA), and increase the funding towards the NHS as promised, or every supporter of the NHS privatisation should resign.
for more info go to
https://www.yournhsneedsyou.com/timeline/
attributes.background: Reject the bill completely, stop systematically privatising the NHS and stop Private Finance Initiatives (PFIs), so the NHS does'nt have to close down/sell land, Reduce administrator roles and use the money on hiring new doctors and nurses with the money wasted on private administrators.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Amend the Health and Care Bill to protect the NHS: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592557

Do not pass the Health and Social Care Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602784
